brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts serial DCE and D T E WAN connections.

Network Topology:
Router R1 (D T E) connects to a CSU/DSU (DCE) on one side of a network cloud. Router R2 (D T E) connects to another CSU/DSU (DCE) on the opposite side of the network cloud.

Data Terminal Equipment (D T E):
- End of the user's device on the WAN link.

Data Communications Equipment (DCE):
- End of the WAN provider's side of the communication facility.
- Responsible for providing the clocking signal.
